name: Slime Gun
description:
The slime gun is the biggest, baddest gun around.  Use it to knock the objects off of the pressure plates.

The controls are simple - aim your slime gun with the mouse and left-click to slime the heck out of your target.

This was created in ~3 hours for Trijam 137.  There are only 6 levels because I didn't want to go into overtime.  It includes sound effects from ZapSplat.com and a great song from Kevin MacLeod.

"Hackbeat" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
